name: Masked in Shadow
description:
A simple puzzle game with a set of switches on the wall. Activate the correct switches to proceed, otherwise the room will reset!

Two levels are made for the game. The puzzle itself stays the same, but the solution is randomized each time the level is loaded.

Walk up to a button and Push to set it. When you think you have the right combination, Push the white button to confirm.

You can also Push the mirrors on the ground, so long as they are on a valid surface.

Controls

Keyboard   

WASD  | Move
Z  | Push
R   | Restart
Esc | Close Game

Controller

Left Stick / D-Pad | Move
A     | Push
R1   | Restart

Twitter:
